description: Number of solutions to non-attacking reflecting queens problem.
references: M. Gardner, Fractal Music, Hypercards and More, Freeman, NY, 1991, p. 240.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
